sentences.en: A successful businessman has to be aggressive.
sentences.cn: 成功的实业家必须得有股冲劲。

sentences.en: Aggressive behaviour is a sign of emotional distress.
sentences.cn: 好斗行为是情感苦闷的一种表现。

sentences.en: an aggressive form of breast cancer
sentences.cn: 一种侵袭性乳腺癌

sentences.en: an aggressive marketing campaign
sentences.cn: 志在必得的营销活动

sentences.en: Even his closest allies describe him as forceful, aggressive and determined.
sentences.cn: 即使他最亲密的盟友也认为他强硬决断、咄咄逼人，不达目的誓不罢休。

sentences.en: He gets aggressive when he's drunk.
sentences.cn: 他喝醉了就喜欢寻衅滋事。

sentences.en: He is respected as a very aggressive and competitive executive.
sentences.cn: 他是一位锐意进取、竞争意识很强的主管，颇受尊敬。

sentences.en: He was acting out his feelings of inferiority by being overly aggressive.
sentences.cn: 他通过过于暴躁好斗的行为来宣泄自卑感.

sentences.en: Her aggressive moods alternated with gentle or more co-operative states.
sentences.cn: 她情绪多变，时而咄咄逼人，时而又显得温柔平和或乐于合作。

sentences.en: It could be argued that the British are not aggressive enough.
sentences.cn: 可以说英国人不够强势。

sentences.en: Jim’s voice became aggressive.
sentences.cn: 吉姆的声音凶了起来。

sentences.en: Lily was in one of her aggressive moods.
sentences.cn: 莉莉当时不依不饶。

sentences.en: On the Stock Exchange, aggressive buying propped the market up.
sentences.cn: 在证券交易所，市场在大量买单的推动下有所上扬。

sentences.en: Teachers apparently expect a certain amount of aggressive behaviour from boys.
sentences.cn: 老师显然料到男孩子多少会有些好勇斗狠的行为。

sentences.en: The dogs are trained to be aggressive.
sentences.cn: 这些狗被训练得具有攻击性.

sentences.en: The Front adopted an aggressive propaganda campaign against its rivals.
sentences.cn: 该阵线采用激进的宣传手段对付它的对手。

sentences.en: The guard dog was now in kennels as it was not aggressive.
sentences.cn: 这条看门狗不好斗，因此正在养狗场受训。

sentences.en: The Zambian game is much more aggressive than European soccer.
sentences.cn: 赞比亚的这种运动比欧式足球要激烈得多。

sentences.en: We decided that in the game we would be physical and aggressive.
sentences.cn: 我们决定在比赛中积极拼抢，大胆进攻。

sentences.en: You'd better keep the two aggressive boys apart.
sentences.cn: 你最好把那两个好斗的男孩分开.

words.tran_cn: 侵略地；攻击地；有闯劲地

phrases.tran_cn: 积极成长型；进取型的投资管理

trans.tran_cn: 好斗的，挑衅的，积极进取的，声势浩大的
trans.tran_en: behaving in an angry threatening way, as if you want to fight or attack someone
